statements: UPDATE ad_creatives SET ad_name = 'New Ad Name', ad_type = 'image' WHERE ad_id = 1;

UPDATE ad_creatives SET clicks = 1000 WHERE ad_id = 123;
UPDATE ad_performance SET revenue = 500.23, cost = 200.50 WHERE performance_id = 456;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET creative_name = 'New Creative Name', clicks = clicks + 10 WHERE ad_id = 100;
UPDATE ad_performance SET revenue = 500.50, cost = cost * 1.1 WHERE performance_id = 50;
UPDATE ad_creatives SET ad_name='New Ad 1', creative_text='Exciting Creative 1' WHERE id=1;

UPDATE ad_campaigns SET start_date = '2022-01-01', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE campaign_id = 1;
